summary: This document is an email chain from June 2024 between a Special Agent from the FBI New York Field Office and attorneys Erica T. Dubno and Jessica-Wind Abolafia. The correspondence concerns a request for a letter from the FBI or DOJ to support an application, likely related to a victim's immigration status (I-914 Supplement B), and references prior collaboration in 2022 and 2020. The context involves supporting a victim's healing process.

persons.name: Erica T. Dubno
persons.context: Attorney from Fahringer & Dubno law firm who is corresponding with the FBI Special Agent to request a support letter for a client's application, referencing work with Sanctuary for Families.

persons.name: Jessica-Wind Abolafia
persons.role: Director, Anti-Trafficking Initiative at Sanctuary for Families
persons.context: Corresponds with the FBI Special Agent regarding draft documents (I-914 Supplement B and a letter) for a victim, following up on the status of approvals and providing details of victimization.

connections.description: Both are working together on a legal case involving a victim, coordinating with the FBI to secure support documents.

keyFacts: The correspondence involves a request for a letter from the FBI or Department of Justice to support an application, likely related to a victim's immigration status (I-914 Supplement B).
The victim's period of victimization is stated as approximately 2003 to 2018.
The organization Sanctuary for Families, specifically its Anti-Trafficking Initiative, is involved in supporting the victim.
The emails reference prior collaboration and document exchanges between the attorneys and the FBI in 2022 and 2020.
There is an urgency due to a June 20, 2024 deadline for submitting a full response.
